articles.author: Allegra Goodwin, Gianluca Mezzofiore
articles.title: US-made 2,000-pound bombs likely used in strike that killed Hezbollah chief Nasrallah, CNN analysis shows - CNN
articles.description: American-manufactured 2,000-pound bombs were likely used in the Israeli attack that killed Hezbollah’s leader, Hassan Nasrallah, in Beirut on Friday night, according to a review of footage showing the operation and its aftermath by CNN and munitions experts.
articles.content: American-manufactured 2,000-pound bombs were likely used in the Israeli attack that killed Hezbollahs leader, Hassan Nasrallah, in Beirut on Friday night, according to a review of footage showing the… [+5094 chars]

articles.title: Why the most climate-resistant glaciers are hiding in plain sight - NPR
articles.description: In the American West, white glaciers and snow fields are outnumbered by long-overlooked “rock glaciers.” The rock covering these vast hunks of ice makes them far less affected by warming temperatures.
articles.content:
In the Wasatch mountains near Salt Lake City, Utah, a popular hiking trail winds up through aspen and spruce trees to reach White Pine Lake.
Scott Hotaling is marching up this familiar path, but pas… [+7662 chars]
